1: Ri e chomanic e rech ri winak; ri q'uisbal u tza'm tzij ruc' ri Ajawaxel c'o wi.
2: Che ri winak utz cäril ronojel ri cubano, are' c'u ri Ajawaxel are' cak'atow tzij paquiwi' tak ri chomanic.
3: Chebajacha' tak ri a chac pa u k'ab ri Ajawaxel, utz c'u quebel na ri cachomaj qui banic.
4: Ri Ajawaxel u winakirisam ronojel che jun patanijic; xukuje' ne ri itzel winak che ri k'ij re ri c'äjisabal wächaj.
5: Ri Ajawaxel man quebucoch' taj ri cäquiban nimal; matam o chanim cäquirik na ri c'äjisabal qui wäch.
6: Ruc' lok'ok'ebal c'uxaj, xukuje' kastzij, cäcuy ri macaj; we cäkaya' u k'ij ri Ajawaxel canajtin jun ri' che ri etzelal.
7: Aretak ri Ajawaxel cäkaj ri u c'aslemal jun winak chuwäch, xukuje' ne cuc' ri qui banom qui c'ulel che quebucoj pa jamaril ruc'.
8: Nim na u k'ij ri jubik' ri ch'äcom ruc' ch'ajch'ojil, chuwäch ri nimalaj ch'äcoj ri ch'äcom ruc' subunic.
9: Che ri winak caya' wi ri qui banic ri chomanic, ri Ajawaxel are' cäc'amow u be ri e u xo'l tak rakan.
10: Ri ajawinel are cubij ri cäbix che rumal ri Dios, man cuban ta jun k'atan tzij ri ma ta suc'.
11: Ri e pajbal xukuje' ri e etabal quekaj chuxe' ri u k'atan tzij ri Ajawaxel; conojel ri pajbal e banom rumal are'.
12: Ri ajawinelab man quequic'amowaj taj ri itzel tak banoj, rumal rech chi ri tem re ajawibal are' u tac'alibal ri suq'uilal.
13: Ri ajawinelab are' cäquilok'ok'ej xukuje' are' cäkaj chquiwäch ri cätzijon ruc' tz'akatil ri man ruc' ta cawächil.
14: Ri royowal ri ajawinel are' tako'n re cämical, quech c'ut ri ajno'jab ri u tzucuxic u jamarisaxic.
15: Ri u quicotemal ri ajawinel chi'nic rech c'aslemal, are c'u ri utzalaj u rayibal xak junam ruc' ri sutz' ri ruc'am jäb.
16: Are utz na u rikic no'j che u q'uexwäch k'an puak; are utz na ri utzalaj chomanic chuwäch ri sak puak.
17: Ri qui be ri e suc' are ri u najtajisaxic quib che ri etzelal; ri u chajixic ri ka c'aslemal are wa' ri u chajixic kib pa kech wi.
18: Chrij ri nimal, cäpe ri tzakmajic; chrij ri nimarisan ib, ri tzakic.
19: Are utz na u mach'irisaxic ib cuc' ri mebayib, che u banic ib k'inom cuc' ri e banal tak nimal.
20: Ri utz cuban che cuc'axic ri jastak utz quelic; ¡sibalaj utz re ri cujiquiba' u c'u'x chrij ri Ajawaxel!
21: Ri cächoman ruc' no'jinic cabinax c'oxomanel che; ri ch'uch'ujalaj tak tzij cäch'äcanic.
22: We c'o utzalaj chomanic c'o jun u q'uiyibal c'aslemal ri'. Ri qui tijoxic ri man c'o ta qui no'j xukuje' man no'j taj.
23: Ri cächoman ruc' no'j, utz u bixic ri cubij, e are' c'ut ri e u tzij utzalaj ch'äcanic cubano.
24: Ri tzij ri e qui' e jun rakaj juyubal räx cab: cuqui'yarisaj ri chajin anima' quequiya' c'u c'ac' tak chuk'ab.
25: E c'o be ri je ta ne e suc' quebilitajic, pa ri qui q'uisbal c'ut c'o wi ri cämical.
26: Ri u wi'jinic ri cachacunic cätakchi'n che chac; ri numic ri cuna' are' cätakchi'n che u banic.
27: Ri banal etzelal are' jun jorno re etzelal, ¡xukuje' ne ri e u tzij quejunamataj ruc' ri rak' k'ak'!
28: Ri itzel winak quebuyac ch'o'j; ri yacal tzijtal are' cäyacow c'ulelam tak ib.
29: Ri ch'u'j u jolom cusub ri rachil cujech'obisaj bic pa jun itzel be.
30: Quebuyupuchij ri e u bak'wäch ri cuchomaj u banic lawaloyil; quebutia' ri u chi' ri bantajinak lawaloyil rumal.
31: Ri e sak tak wi'aj e jun corona ri takalic, ri ch'äcom rumal jun c'aslemal ri tz'akat pa ronojel.
32: Are c'o na u k'ij ri coch'onic chuwäch ri chuk'ab; are c'o na u k'ij ri u ch'äquic rib jun pa re wi che u q'uexwäch ri qui ch'äquic tak tinimit.
33: Ri winak quebuq'uiak taklebenic, are' c'ut ri Ajawaxel are cajiquibanic ronojel.
